attributes.action: to put the income support up to match the cost of living including fuel bills eg petrol ect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the goverment should put the income support up to match the cost of living because as the cost of living rises income support should rise to match the cost of living and to stop people dying of starvation and the cold. this would put a burden on the nhs when it could have been avioded.
